name: Marcus Ashford
title: Heir Apparent to Celestia
core_wound: Nothing he does is ever good enough for his father; has spent his life trying to earn approval that never comes; fears he's becoming the cold man his father is
wants: To prove himself worthy of the Ashford name and finally earn his father's respect
needs: To realize he doesn't need his father's approval and forge his own path
voice_markers: Speaks precisely like his father when in public (learned behavior)
Uses military terminology even in casual conversation
Becomes more relaxed and uses contractions when not around nobility
Tends to over-explain and justify his decisions
Says 'with all due respect' before disagreeing (which is often)
contradiction: Desperate for father's approval yet increasingly resentful of his father's methods; wants to be different but acts exactly the same when pressured
physical_description: Handsome and athletic with dark hair and his father's blue eyes. Clean-shaven and immaculately dressed in modern formal attire. Carries himself with military bearing from his service years.

relationships.Lysander_Ashford: Father; loves him but also fears and resents him; desperate for approval but beginning to question his values
relationships.Cassandra_Ashford: Mother; warm relationship but feels he can't confide in her about his doubts
relationships.Victoria_Ashford: Sister; protective of her but sometimes dismisses her ideas due to ingrained sexism; doesn't realize she's more capable than him
relationships.Sienna_Cross: Unknown half-sister; will meet her in Book 1 without knowing their connection; immediate attraction
relationships.Nikolai_Volkov: Rival heir from enemy family; grudging mutual respect beneath the family hatred
relationships.Aria_Chen: Tactical officer he served with during military service; secret lover; forbidden relationship (she's common-born)

secrets: Having a secret affair with Aria Chen, a common-born officer (would be scandal if discovered)
Disagrees with his father's hardline policies but afraid to speak up
Suffering from anxiety attacks from the pressure of succession expectations
Has been secretly learning about reformist political philosophy
Once helped a group of workers avoid punishment, covering it up from his father
knowledge_state: Trained in leadership, politics, and military strategy
Knows the official history of the Seven Families but not the secret deals
Aware of tensions between families but doesn't know how deep they go
Does not know about his half-sister Sienna
Does not know his mother is funding reformist movements
